SEARCH
Package gw.api.system.cluster

Interface NodeFailureHandler

public interface NodeFailureHandler
Plugin that is called when the nodeFailed method is called on the Maintenance Tools or the failed server is restarting and cleaning its own background tasks left after its previous run. This plugin must not call any external components! Its methods must return true if a specified batch process, a message destination, or a startable plugin requires manual cleanup or manual restart when the node it was running on fails. User: akorostov Date: 6/30/14

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isManualCleanupRequiredForBatchProcess(BatchProcessType type, boolean serverIsRestarting)
    Return true if a specified batch process must be left in the state that prevents it to be started again until manual intervention.
    boolean
    isManualRestartRequiredForMessageDestination(int destinationId, boolean serverIsRestarting)
    Return true if a specified message destination cannot be automatically restarted on some other node.
    boolean
    isManualRestartRequiredForStartablePlugin(String pluginName, boolean serverIsRestarting)
    Return true if a specified startable plugin cannot be automatically restarted on some other node.

  • Method Details

    • isManualCleanupRequiredForBatchProcess

      boolean isManualCleanupRequiredForBatchProcess(BatchProcessType type, boolean serverIsRestarting)
      Return true if a specified batch process must be left in the state that prevents it to be started again until manual intervention.
      Parameters:
      type - batch process type
      serverIsRestarting - true if it is the same server (same serverId) is restarting and it finds an active batch process record in the database left after its previous run.

    • isManualRestartRequiredForMessageDestination

      boolean isManualRestartRequiredForMessageDestination(int destinationId, boolean serverIsRestarting)
      Return true if a specified message destination cannot be automatically restarted on some other node.
      Parameters:
      destinationId - destination id
      serverIsRestarting - true if it is the same server (same serverId) is restarting and it finds an active message destination record in the database left after its previous run.

    • isManualRestartRequiredForStartablePlugin

      boolean isManualRestartRequiredForStartablePlugin(String pluginName, boolean serverIsRestarting)
      Return true if a specified startable plugin cannot be automatically restarted on some other node.
      Parameters:
      pluginName - plugin name
      serverIsRestarting - true if it is the same server (same serverId) is restarting and it finds an active startable plugin record in the database left after its previous run.
